name: Bubble For Money
description:
Search no further whether it was by chance or not you have found the best bubble shooter gaming experience.
Despite being so successful bubble shooter has always been an incomplete game, although many companies have tried to perfect it they were always missing the key ingredient - Money.

We are now bringing you the chance to play the most complete bubble shooter game with money to ensure you ultimate satisfaction and to provide a game experience similar to the most exhilarating feeling ever.

Features

¤ REAL MONEY GAME:Cash prizes against other players around the world.

¤ FREE COINS DAILY: Collect your virtual bonus every day.

¤ FREE GIFTS: Receive special bonuses and promotions.

¤ INSTANT WORLDWIDE PLAY: Choose a board and play immediately against players from all over the world

¤ BEAUTIFUL AND UNIQUE UI: A chic and classy design.


Apple is not associated with or responsible for any contests within this app.
